p: An analysis of the Indian summer monsoon-ENSO relationship showed over persistence of ENSO events in many CMIP models, while the relation between Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) and the Indian monsoon-IOD was not found to be significant in the simulations 29. These analyses were used as a basis for a methodology for selecting (12) “best” models to analyze projections in the RCP8.5 scenario 29. However, the objective criteria did not include the quality of the simulation of the trends.
